name: Eyes In The Dark (Lamaroo)
description:
Team 3 pink ink our game for the McGame Jam 2022. You player as miner lost in a dark mine with only your headlight to light your way, find oil cans to refuel your light, and break rocks with your pickaxe. Controllers are A, D to move left and right, hold E to use your pickaxe and spacebar to jump.

But beware something in the dark lurks you must be vigilant and make sure nothing is behind you.

This project was created by Leo and Colin.

Thanks to the royalty-free music found at: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ 

and tile assets from the unity store by: Szadi Art. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-fantasy-caves-152375...

Lead programmer: Leo

Helper programmer and Lead art design: Colin
